StratmasClient.communication
Class StratmasMessage

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.communication.XMLHelper
      StratmasClient.communication.StratmasMessage
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConnectMessage, DisconnectMessage, GetGridMessage, InitializationMessage, RegisterForUpdatesMessage, ResetMessage, ServerCapabilitiesMessage, SetPropertyMessage, StepMessage, SubscriptionMessage, UpdateMessage
public abstract class StratmasMessage
extends XMLHelper

Abstract class that is the super class of all messages to be sent between the vlient and the server.
